title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Tue May 14 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue Apr 30 2024 23:18:44 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue May 14 2024 18:33:28 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
